title: Holiday Greeting
description: Holiday greeting + emotional connection + discount guidance, suitable for all reachable users.
template: Dear ${name}, happy ${holidayName}! On this special day, we thank you for your continued support and trust. As a distinguished customer from ${location}, you are invited to enjoy a ${discount} off on ${primaryProcedure}. Offer valid until ${validUntil}. We look forward to seeing you again!

title: Repurchase Reminder
description: After a period post-surgery, remind users to repurchase and maintain results. Suitable for customers with repurchase potential.
template: Hello ${name}, it has been ${monthsSince} months since your last ${lastProcedure}. To help you maintain the best results, we have reserved a limited-time ${discount} off repurchase offer for ${primaryProcedure}. If you are still in ${location}, feel free to visit us again for an upgraded experience.

title: New Product Recommendation
description: Recommend new products to curious and novelty-seeking users to increase trial rates.
template: Hi ${name}, we have just launched a brand new service: ${newProductName}! Based on your previous preferences (${primaryProcedure}) and referral source (${referralSource}), we invite you to be among the first to try it out and enjoy a special trial price of ${trialDiscount} off. Feel free to contact us for more information!
